```{r}
# calculate dmsmat with increasing nmut

get_dmsmat_new <- function(wt, nmut, mut_dl_sigma = 0.1, mut_sd_min = 1, seed = 1024) {
  t1 <- tic()
  dmsmat <- dmsmat_dms.new(wt, nmut, mut_dl_sigma, mut_sd_min, seed)
  t2 <- toc(quiet = T)
  t = t2$toc - t2$tic
  lst(dmsmat, t)
  
}

get_dmsmat_fast <- function(wt,  mut_dl_sigma = 0.1, mut_sd_min = 1) {
  t1 <- tic()
  dmsmat <- dmsmat_dms.fast(wt, mut_dl_sigma, mut_sd_min)
  t2 <- toc(quiet = T)
  t = t2$toc - t2$tic
  lst(dmsmat, t)
}


 dms_matrices <- tibble(nmut = c(10, 20, 50, 100, 200),
               wt = lst(wt, wt, wt, wt, wt)) %>%
   mutate(dms_new = map2(wt, nmut, get_dmsmat_new)) %>%
   mutate(dms_fast = map(wt, get_dmsmat_fast))



dms_matrices <- dms_matrices %>% 
  mutate(t_new = map_dbl(dms_new, "t"),
         t_fast = map_dbl(dms_fast, "t"),
         dmsmat_new = map(dms_new, "dmsmat"),
         dmsmat_fast = map(dms_fast, "dmsmat")) %>% 
  select(-wt, -dms_fast, -dms_new)

```

## dms matrices
dms(i,j) is the maximum possible compensation between mutations at i and j

```{r}
dmsmat_new <- filter(dms_matrices, nmut == 10)$dmsmat_new[[1]]
dmsmat_fast <- filter(dms_matrices, nmut == 10)$dmsmat_fast[[1]]

dat <- matrix_to_tibble(dmsmat_new, value_name = "dmsij_new") %>% 
  inner_join(matrix_to_tibble(dmsmat_fast, value_name = "dmsij_fast")) 


p1 <- plot_matrix(dmsmat_new) + ggtitle("dmsmat_new")
p2 <- plot_matrix(dmsmat_fast) + ggtitle("dmsmat_fast")
p3 <- dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(dmsij_fast, dmsij_new)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  geom_abline(aes(intercept = 0, slope = 1, color = "y = x")) +
  theme_minimal()

(p1 / p2) | p3
```

## Comparison of dms profiles
dms profiles are the marginal averages of the dms matrices

```{r}
pi1 <- dat %>% 
  group_by(i) %>% 
  summarise(dmsi_new = mean(dmsij_new),
            dmsi_fast = mean(dmsij_fast)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("dmsi_new", "dmsi_fast"),
    names_to = "method",
    names_prefix = "dmsi_",
    values_to = "dmsi"
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(i, dmsi, color = method)) +
  geom_line()  +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")

pi2 <- dat %>%
  group_by(i) %>% 
  summarise(dmsi_new = mean(dmsij_new),
            dmsi_fast = mean(dmsij_fast)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(dmsi_fast, dmsi_new)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  geom_abline() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")

pi <- plot_grid(pi1, pi2, rel_widths = c(2, 1))


pj1 <- dat %>% 
  group_by(j) %>% 
  summarise(dmsj_new = mean(dmsij_new),
            dmsj_fast = mean(dmsij_fast)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("dmsj_new", "dmsj_fast"),
    names_to = "method",
    names_prefix = "dmsj_",
    values_to = "dmsj"
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(j, dmsj, color = method)) +
  geom_line()  +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")

pj2 <- dat %>% 
  group_by(j) %>% 
  summarise(dmsj_new = mean(dmsij_new),
            dmsj_fast = mean(dmsij_fast)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(dmsj_fast, dmsj_new)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  geom_abline() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")

pj <- plot_grid(pj1, pj2, rel_widths = c(2, 1))


pi / pj


```


## Comparison of cpu times

```{r}
# cpu times
dms_matrices %>% 
  select(nmut, t_new, t_fast) %>% 
  mutate(t_fast = mean(t_fast)) %>% 
  mutate(t_rel = t_new / t_fast) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("t_new", "t_fast", "t_rel"),
    names_to = "method",
    values_to = "cpu_time"
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(nmut, cpu_time)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~ method) +
  theme_minimal()
```


## Convergence with increasing nmut

```{r}
# convergence plots

rho <- function(m1, m2) {
  cor(as.vector(m1), as.vector(m2))
}

rhoi <- function(m1, m2) {
  cor(rowMeans(m1), rowMeans(m2))
}

rhoj <- function(m1, m2) {
  cor(colMeans(m1), colMeans(m2))
}

dms_matrices %>% 
  group_by(nmut) %>% 
  summarise(rho = map2_dbl(dmsmat_new, dmsmat_fast, rho),
            rhoi = map2_dbl(dmsmat_new, dmsmat_fast, rhoi),
            rhoj = map2_dbl(dmsmat_new, dmsmat_fast, rhoj)
            ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(rho, rhoi, rhoj),
    names_to = "measure",
    values_to = "rho"
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(nmut, rho, color = measure)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se  = F) +
  theme_minimal()

```
